channel.title: Christmas
channel.description: anybody know any good ideas for a christmas event and how to make a christmas event.

item.title: Christmas
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

not sure about this but u can can get differrent colour custom santa hats, maybe you could download the models of them and add to your server and put them in ur . npcdrop.cfg . file and have like a 1% of drop on a high monster maybe(dragons/kbd/kq) just a thought

-sam

On the modeling part of the forum i found a guy that had made full santa armour, maybe thats worth taking a look at

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“soi spoon, post:2, topic:320579”]ERM,
You could make some custom items if you have client,

[ul][li]for example santa cosume thne make it a rare drop.[/li]
[li]You could make christmas crackers a sort of rare drop :)[/li][/ul]

But im sorry i would not know how to code a decent cristmas event for im noobie at coding…[/quote]

Thanks for the idea.
